description: G.f. for Moebius transform is x * (1 + x) / (1 + x^4).
formula: Moebius transform is period 8 sequence [1, 1, 0, 0, -1, -1, 0, 0, ...]. - _Michael Somos_, Sep 20 2005G.f.: Sum_{k>0} x^k * (1 + x^k) / (1 + x^(4*k)). - _Michael Somos_, Sep 20 2005a(8*n + 5) = 0. a(8*n + 3) = A033761(n). - _Michael Somos_, Nov 16 2011
prog: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<1, 0, sumdiv( n, d, kronecker( -4, (d-1)%8\2 + 1)))} /* _Michael Somos_, Sep 20 2005 */
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
